alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 7:37PM CDT until July 10 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LINCOLN COUNTY... At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Platte, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 168 and 179. Highway 83 between mile markers 72 and 87. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
